snippet: Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman will seek the cooperation of Apple, Google, Microsoft and Samsung to find ways of improving the security of the devices.
abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman asks nation's largest cellphone makers Apple, Google, Microsoft and Samsung for their cooperation in working on new measures to reduce smartphone thefts; action is latest sign of increased attention to what some people describe as a national epidemic.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric T. Schneiderman will seek the cooperation of Apple, Google, Microsoft and Samsung to find ways of improving the security of the devices.

headline.seo: New York Asks Smartphone Makers to Help Prevent Thefts
headline.main: New York State to Ask Smartphone Makers to Help Prevent Thefts
